Zetta Elliott (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 26, afọ 1972) bụ onye Kanada-Amerịka na-ede uri, onye na-ede egwuregwu, na onye edemede
Akwụkwọ foto mbụ ya bụ Bird, meriri ọtụtụ ihe nrite. A makwaara ya maka onyinye ndị ọzọ na akwụkwọ ụmụaka, yana maka edemede ya, egwuregwu, na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị na-eto eto.

A mụrụ Elliott na Ajax, Ontario, Canada, n'ọnwa Ọctoba 26, n'afọ 1972. O biri na America maka ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya, ebe ọ kwagara Brooklyn na 1994 iji malite dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum New York (NYU). N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ kwagara Philadelphia
O nwere PhD na ọmụmụ Amerịka na NYU ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ na ọtụtụ kọleji.
Ọrụ Elliott gụnyere ịgbake site na ime ihe ike n'obodo ukwu na nsogbu ndị ọzọ siri ike nke ndụ ọgbara ọhụrụ, nke ọ na-ekwu maka akụkụ iji nyere ndị isi ojii ibe ya aka ịhụ ha.
Mbipụta ọkachamara mbụ nke Elliott bụ akwụkwọ foto ụmụaka Bird, n'afọ 2008
Ònye ihe atụ Shadra Strickland meriri Ezra Jack Keats Book Award n'afọ 2009 maka Onye ọhụrụ n'ihe atu maka akwụkwọ ahụ
Bird ritekwara New Voices Award Honor site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta ya, Lee & Low Books, yana 2009 Paterson Prize for Book for Young Readers, na 2011 West Virginia Children's Choice Book Award
Elliott dere Bird na mbụ dị ka obere akụkọ na 2006, mana ọ chọtara onye na-ebipụta ya mgbe ya na Strickland rụgharịrị ya ka ọ bụrụ akwụkwọ foto.
